Name: Treecko
PkdxEntry: It quickly scales even vertical walls. It senses humidity with its tail to predict the next day’s weather.

Name: Grovyle
PkdxEntry: Its strongly developed thigh muscles give it astounding agility and jumping performance.

Name: Sceptile
PkdxEntry: The leaves on its forelegs are as sharp as swords. It agilely leaps about the branches of trees to strike.

Name: Torchic
PkdxEntry: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.

Name: Combusken
PkdxEntry: It lashes out with 10 kicks per second. Its strong fighting instinct compels it to keep up its offensive until the opponent gives up.

Name: Blaziken
PkdxEntry: It learns martial arts that use punches and kicks. Every several years, its old feathers burn off, and new, supple feathers grow back in their place.

Name: Mudkip
PkdxEntry: On land, it can powerfully lift large boulders by planting its four feet and heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil at the water’s edge.

Name: Marshtomp
PkdxEntry: Its toughened hind legs enable it to stand upright. Because it weakens if its skin dries out, it replenishes fluids by playing in mud.

Name: Swampert
PkdxEntry: If it senses the approach of a storm and a tidal wave, it protects its seaside nest by piling up boulders. It swims as fast as a jet ski.

Name: Poochyena
PkdxEntry: It savagely threatens foes with bared fangs. It chases after fleeing targets tenaciously. It turns tail and runs, however, if the foe strikes back.

Name: Mightyena
PkdxEntry: It chases down prey in a pack of around ten. They defeat foes with perfectly coordinated teamwork.

Name: Zigzagoon
PkdxEntry: A POKéMON with abundant curiosity. It shows an interest in everything, so it always zigs and zags.

Name: Linoone
PkdxEntry: When running in a straight line, it can top 60 miles per hour. However, it has a tough time with curved roads.

Name: Wurmple
PkdxEntry: It lives amidst tall grass and in forests. When attacked, it resists by pointing its venomous spikes at the foe.

Name: Silcoon
PkdxEntry: It conserves its energy by moving as little as possible. It awaits evolution while drinking only a little rainwater.

Name: Beautifly
PkdxEntry: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.

Name: Cascoon
PkdxEntry: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.

Name: Dustox
PkdxEntry: It scatters horribly toxic dust when it senses danger. They tend to gather in the glow of streetlamps at night.

Name: Lotad
PkdxEntry: It searches about for clean water. If it does not drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.

Name: Lombre
PkdxEntry: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.

Name: Ludicolo
PkdxEntry: When it hears festive music, all the cells in its body become stimulated, and it begins moving in rhythm. It does not quail even when it faces a tough opponent.

Name: Seedot
PkdxEntry: It hangs off branches and absorbs nutrients. When it finishes eating, its body becomes so heavy that it drops to the ground with a thump.

Name: Nuzleaf
PkdxEntry: The sound of its grass flute makes its listeners uneasy. It lives deep in forests.

Name: Shiftry
PkdxEntry: A POKéMON that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.

Name: Taillow
PkdxEntry: It dislikes cold seasons. They migrate to other lands in search of warmth, flying over 180 miles a day.

Name: Swellow
PkdxEntry: If its two tail feathers are standing at attention, it is proof of good health. It soars elegantly in the sky.

Name: Wingull
PkdxEntry: It rides upon ocean winds as if it were a glider. In the winter, it hides food around its nest.

Name: Pelipper
PkdxEntry: It is a flying transporter that carries small POKéMON in its beak. It bobs on the waves to rest its wings.

Name: Ralts
PkdxEntry: It is highly attuned to the emotions of people and POKéMON. It hides if it senses hostility.

Name: Kirlia
PkdxEntry: The cheerful spirit of its TRAINER gives it energy for its psychokinetic power. It spins and dances when happy.

Name: Gardevoir
PkdxEntry: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its TRAINER.

Name: Surskit
PkdxEntry: They usually live on ponds, but after an evening shower, they may appear on puddles in towns.

Name: Masquerain
PkdxEntry: The antennae have distinctive patterns that look like eyes. When it rains, they grow heavy, making flight impossible.

Name: Shroomish
PkdxEntry: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.

Name: Breloom
PkdxEntry: The seeds on its tail are made of toxic spores. It knocks out foes with quick, virtually invisible punches.

Name: Slakoth
PkdxEntry: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.

Name: Vigoroth
PkdxEntry: It is always hungry because it won’t stop rampaging. Even while it is eating, it can’t keep still.

Name: Slaking
PkdxEntry: It is the world’s most slothful POKéMON. However, it can exert horrifying power by releasing pent-up energy all at once.

Name: Nincada
PkdxEntry: Because it lived almost entirely underground, it is nearly blind. It uses its antennae instead.

Name: Ninjask
PkdxEntry: This POKéMON is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.

Name: Shedinja
PkdxEntry: A discarded bug shell that came to life. Peering into the crack on its back is said to steal one’s spirit.

Name: Whismur
PkdxEntry: It usually murmurs, but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.

Name: Loudred
PkdxEntry: When it stamps its feet and bellows, it generates ultrasonic waves that can blow apart a house.

Name: Exploud
PkdxEntry: It emits a variety of sounds from the holes all over its body. Its loud cries can be heard from over six miles away.

Name: Makuhita
PkdxEntry: It grows stronger by enduring harsh training. It is a gutsy POKéMON that can withstand any attack.

Name: Hariyama
PkdxEntry: It stomps on the ground to build power. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.

Name: Azurill
PkdxEntry: It battles by flinging around its tail, which is bigger than its body. The tail is a flotation device in water.

Name: Nosepass
PkdxEntry: Its nose is a magnet. As a result, this Pokémon always keeps its face pointing north.

Name: Skitty
PkdxEntry: It is said to be difficult to earn its trust. However, it is extremely popular for its cute looks and behavior.

Name: Delcatty
PkdxEntry: The favorite of trend-conscious female TRAINERS, they are used in competition for their style and fur.

Name: Sableye
PkdxEntry: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.

Name: Mawile
PkdxEntry: It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into complacency, then bites with its huge, relentless jaws.

Name: Aron
PkdxEntry: It eats iron to build its steel body. It is a pest that descends from mountains to eat bridges and train tracks.

Name: Lairon
PkdxEntry: It habitually shows off its strength with the size of sparks it creates by ramming its steel body into boulders.

Name: Aggron
PkdxEntry: It claims a large mountain as its sole territory. It mercilessly thrashes those that violate its space.

Name: Meditite
PkdxEntry: It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens its inner strength through meditation.

Name: Medicham
PkdxEntry: It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps, then launches a devastating blow in the same motion.

Name: Electrike
PkdxEntry: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

Name: Manectric
PkdxEntry: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.

Name: Plusle
PkdxEntry: It cheers on partners while scattering sparks from its body. It climbs telephone poles to absorb electricity.

Name: Minun
PkdxEntry: Its dislike of water makes it take shelter under the eaves of houses in rain. It uses pom-poms made of sparks for cheering.

Name: Volbeat
PkdxEntry: It lives around clean ponds. At night, its rear lights up. It converses with others by flashing its light.

Name: Illumise
PkdxEntry: It guides VOLBEAT to draw signs in night skies. There are scientists that study the patterns it creates.

Name: Roselia
PkdxEntry: The beautiful flowers on its arms have toxic thorns. Don’t even think about picking those flowers.

Name: Gulpin
PkdxEntry: There is nothing its stomach can’t digest. While it is digesting, vile, overpowering gases are expelled.

Name: Swalot
PkdxEntry: It can swallow a tire whole in one gulp. It secretes a horribly toxic fluid from the pores on its body.

Name: Carvanha
PkdxEntry: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.

Name: Sharpedo
PkdxEntry: The ruffian of the seas, it has fangs that crunch through iron. It swims by jetting water from its rear.

Name: Wailmer
PkdxEntry: When it sucks in a large volume of seawater, it becomes like a big, bouncy ball. It eats a ton of food daily.

Name: Wailord
PkdxEntry: It is among the largest of all POKéMON. It herds prey in a pack then swallows the massed prey in one gulp.

Name: Numel
PkdxEntry: Magma of almost 2,200 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. When it grows cold, the magma hardens and slows it.

Name: Camerupt
PkdxEntry: If angered, the humps on its back erupt in a shower of molten lava. It lives in the craters of volcanoes.

Name: Torkoal
PkdxEntry: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

Name: Spoink
PkdxEntry: It apparently dies if it stops bouncing about. It carries a pearl from CLAMPERL on its head.

Name: Grumpig
PkdxEntry: It can gain control over foes by doing odd dance steps. The black pearls on its forehead are precious gems.

Name: Spinda
PkdxEntry: It is distinguished by a pattern of spots that is always different. Its unsteady, tottering walk has the effect of fouling its foe’s aim.

Name: Trapinch
PkdxEntry: It lives in arid deserts. It makes a sloping pit trap in sand where it patiently awaits prey.

Name: Vibrava
PkdxEntry: It violently shudders its wings, generating ultrasonic waves to induce headaches in people.

Name: Flygon
PkdxEntry: It whips up sandstorms with powerful flaps of its wings. It is known as “The Desert Spirit.”

Name: Cacnea
PkdxEntry: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.

Name: Cacturne
PkdxEntry: It lives in deserts. It becomes active at night when it hunts for prey exhausted from the desert’s heat.

Name: Swablu
PkdxEntry: Its wings are like cotton tufts. If it perches on someone’s head, it looks like a cotton hat.

Name: Altaria
PkdxEntry: It hums in a beautiful soprano voice. It flies among white clouds in the blue sky. It launches intensely hot fireballs from its mouth.

Name: Zangoose
PkdxEntry: It has feuded with SEVIPER for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.

Name: Seviper
PkdxEntry: For many generations, it has feuded with ZANGOOSE. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.

Name: Lunatone
PkdxEntry: Its health ebbs and flows with the lunar cycle. It brims with power when exposed to the light of the full moon.

Name: Solrock
PkdxEntry: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.

Name: Barboach
PkdxEntry: It probes muddy riverbeds with its two long whiskers. A slimy film protects its body.

Name: Whiscash
PkdxEntry: As a result of causing tremors by thrashing about, it developed the ability to foretell real quakes.

Name: Corphish
PkdxEntry: It came from overseas. It is a very hardy creature that will quickly proliferate, even in polluted streams.

Name: Crawdaunt
PkdxEntry: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.

Name: Baltoy
PkdxEntry: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.

Name: Claydol
PkdxEntry: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.

Name: Lileep
PkdxEntry: It became extinct roughly 100 million years ago. It was regenerated from a fossil using advanced techniques.

Name: Cradily
PkdxEntry: It ensnares prey with its eight tentacles. It then melts the prey with a strong acid before feeding.

Name: Anorith
PkdxEntry: It is a kind of POKéMON progenitor. It uses its extending claws to catch prey hiding among rocks on the seafloor.

Name: Armaldo
PkdxEntry: Protected by a hard shell, its body is very sturdy. It skewers prey with its claws to feed.

Name: Feebas
PkdxEntry: Ridiculed for its shabby appearance, it is ignored by researchers. It lives in ponds choked with weeds.

Name: Milotic
PkdxEntry: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.

Name: Castform
PkdxEntry: It has the ability to change its form into the sun, the rain, or a snow cloud, depending on the weather.

Name: Kecleon
PkdxEntry: It changes body color to blend in with its surroundings. It also changes color if it is happy or sad.

Name: Shuppet
PkdxEntry: It loves to feed on feelings like envy and malice. Its upright horn catches the emotions of people.

Name: Banette
PkdxEntry: Strong feelings of hatred turned a puppet into a POKéMON. If it opens its mouth, its cursed energy escapes.

Name: Duskull
PkdxEntry: Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks up to prey. It has the ability to slip through thick walls.

Name: Dusclops
PkdxEntry: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.

Name: Tropius
PkdxEntry: It lives in tropical jungles. The bunch of fruit around its neck is delicious. The fruit grows twice a year.

Name: Chimecho
PkdxEntry: It travels by riding on winds. It cleverly uses its long tail to pluck nuts and berries, which it loves to eat.

Name: Absol
PkdxEntry: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom-bringer.

Name: Wynaut
PkdxEntry: It tends to move in a pack with others. They cluster in a tight group to sleep in a cave.

Name: Snorunt
PkdxEntry: It’s said that if they are seen at midnight, they’ll cause heavy snow. They eat snow and ice to survive.

Name: Glalie
PkdxEntry: It has a body of ice that won’t melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.

Name: Spheal
PkdxEntry: Its body is covered in fluffy fur. The fur keeps it from feeling cold while it is rolling on ice.

Name: Sealeo
PkdxEntry: It habitually spins things on its nose. By doing so, it learns textures and odors.

Name: Walrein
PkdxEntry: It swims through icy seas while shattering ice floes with its large tusks. It is protected by its thick blubber.

Name: Clamperl
PkdxEntry: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.

Name: Huntail
PkdxEntry: It lives deep in the sea where no light ever filters down. It lights up its small fishlike tail to attract prey.

Name: Gorebyss
PkdxEntry: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.

Name: Relicanth
PkdxEntry: It has remained unchanged for 100 million years. It was discovered during a deep-sea exploration.

Name: Luvdisc
PkdxEntry: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.

Name: Bagon
PkdxEntry: Its steel-hard head can shatter boulders. It longingly hopes for wings to grow so it can fly.

Name: Shelgon
PkdxEntry: It hardly eats while it awaits evolution. It becomes hardier by enduring hunger. Its shell peels off the instant it begins to evolve.

Name: Salamence
PkdxEntry: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.

Name: Beldum
PkdxEntry: It uses magnetic waves to converse with its kind. All the cells in its body are magnetic.

Name: Metang
PkdxEntry: It floats midair using magnetism. Its body is so tough, even a crash with a jet plane won’t leave a scratch.

Name: Metagross
PkdxEntry: It folds its four legs when flying. Its four brains are said to be superior to a supercomputer.

Name: Regirock
PkdxEntry: It is entirely composed of rocks with no sign of a brain or heart. It is a mystery even to modern scientists.

Name: Regice
PkdxEntry: Its body is made of ice from the ice age. It controls frigid air of -328 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Registeel
PkdxEntry: It is sturdier than any kind of metal. It hardened due to pressure underground over tens of thousands of years.

Name: Latias
PkdxEntry: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.

Name: Latios
PkdxEntry: It has a docile temperament and dislikes fighting. Tucking in its forelegs, it can fly faster than a jet plane.

Name: Kyogre
PkdxEntry: This POKéMON is said to have expanded the sea by bringing heavy rains. It has the power to control water.

Name: Groudon
PkdxEntry: This legendary POKéMON is said to represent the land. It went to sleep after dueling KYOGRE.

Name: Rayquaza
PkdxEntry: It has lived for hundreds of millions of years in the ozone layer. Its flying form looks like a meteor.

Name: Jirachi
PkdxEntry: It is said to make any wish come true. It is awake for only seven days out of a thousand years.

Name: Deoxys
PkdxEntry: When it changes form, an aurora appears. It absorbs attacks by altering its cellular structure.
